name: Count of source values in unmapped data
description: The measure analyzes how many source codes are unmapped.

name: Count of deciles appearing in the data (at first observation)
description: The measure analyzes deciles of patients at their first observation. If only certain age groups are being observed, the count of deciles will be low.

name: Patient Provider Ratio
description: The measure looks at how many patients and how many providers are defined in the data. For example, the ratio may indicate abnormaly low number of providers.

name: Percentage of rows in MEASUREMENT table that have NULL recorded as numerical value
description: The measure looks at data recorded in MESUREMENT table. A significant percentage of such rows typically contain a numerical result.

name: Percentage of rows that are unmapped
description: The measure looks at relative size of unmapped data.

name: Count of specialties found in the provider table
description: The measure looks at how many different specialties are present. For general datasets, we expect at least some minimum number of specialties.

name: Count of distinct drug_concept_ids (drug_exposure)
description: Count of distinct drugs. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.
